identity.core_philosophy: Intellectual Sharpness. High contrast, clean lines, focus on content.

buttons.primary: bg-[#FF7F00] text-black hover:bg-[#E67300] font-medium rounded-md px-6 py-2 transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#333333] text-[#F0F0F0] hover:bg-[#333333] hover:text-white rounded-md px-6 py-2
buttons.ghost: text-gray-400 hover:text-[#FF7F00] hover:bg-[#FF7F00]/10 rounded-md px-4 py-2

cards.base: bg-[#000000] border border-[#333333] rounded-lg overflow-hidden transition-all duration-300 hover:border-[#FF7F00]/50 hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(255,127,0,0.1)]

inputs.base: bg-[#1A1A1A] border-[#333333] text-white focus:ring-[#FF7F00] focus:border-[#FF7F00] placeholder:text-gray-600 rounded-md

universal_guidelines: NEVER use gradients for text or borders unless explicitly for a 'glow' effect.
Dark mode is mandatory. Ensure all text contrast ratios meet WCAG AA (4.5:1) against #1A1A1A.
Use data-testid for ALL interactive elements.
No transparent backgrounds for dropdowns/modals - use solid black/dark grey.
Animation: Use subtle transforms (translate-y-1) on hover. No wild spinning or shaking.
Layout: Align text left generally. Center only for Hero headlines.
Forms: Use Shadcn form components but style inputs with dark borders and orange focus rings.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building the frontend. Use the color variables in tailwind.config.js but enforce the override values from this JSON in your custom classes if needed. Focus on the 'Admin Panel' having a clean, dense layout distinct from the 'Public Website' which should be more spacious and impactful.
